title: The Goal Is To Survive - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   School Life   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Academy   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Caring Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Complex Family Relationships   Death of Loved Ones   Destiny   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   European Ambience   Family   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Hated Protagonist   Investigations   Loneliness   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Triangles   Mature Protagonist   Multiple POV   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Politics   Possessive Characters   Power Struggle   Pragmatic Protagonist   Precognition   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Siblings   Sibling's Care   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Sister Complex   Student Council   Villainess Noble Girls   Younger Brothers   Younger Love Interests
author: Okiku Kogiku   大菊小菊
description:
Faritina, who was born into one of the richest families in the kingdom, looks back on a nightmare. 

I remember: wasn't my little brother born two years ago? I had forgotten, but when I went to visit him, he was so cute, and I wanted to protect this sickly little boy.

If the nightmare was a premonition, would she herself and the other siblings be caught up in the Dukes' downfall and die?

At least if we survive, we will be able to laugh one day.

I will protect you. Your smile is our hope.>
